example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS حذر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP من) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC صورة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الفلسطينيين))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يجب) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ال) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART ا)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تكون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC ملطخة) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الارهاب)))))))))))) (PUNC .)))
